subject: Marketing
title: Content-Market Fit
description: A quick win: understand Content-Market Fit.

hook.text: A brilliant article that nobody reads is just an expensive diary entry.

buildup.text: Content-market fit means your content solves real problems your audience actually has.

discovery.text: The gap between what brands want to say and what audiences want to hear is where content fails.

twist.text: The fix isn't better writingâ€”it's better listening. Start with audience needs, not brand goals.

climax.text: Content-market fit turns readers into subscribers and subscribers into customers.

punchline.text: Don't make content you love. Make content they need.

quiz.question: What causes content to miss content-market fit?
options: A gap between what brands say and what audiences want to hear
Using too many images in blog posts
